includedAssets.title: Nice Is Different Than Good
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep1 - Nice Is Different Than Good
includedAssets.synopsis: Mike Delfino's bride is revealed; Lynette faces another pregnancy; Bree tries to break free from her inhibitions; Carlos' niece puts Gabrielle to the test.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Mike Delfino's bride is revealed; Lynette faces another pregnancy; Bree tries to break free from her inhibitions; Ana puts Gabrielle to the test.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Mike Delfino's bride is revealed; Lynette faces another pregnancy; Bree tries to break free from her inhibitions; Carlos' niece puts Gabrielle to the test.

includedAssets.title: Being Alive
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep2 - Being Alive
includedAssets.synopsis: Lynette keeps a secret from Susan; Gabrielle gives Ana love advice; Bree worries about her affair; Angie is determined to protect her son and her family's past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lynette keeps a secret from Susan; Gabrielle gives Ana love advice and Bree worries about her affair.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lynette keeps a secret from Susan; Gabrielle gives Ana love advice; Bree worries about her affair; Angie is determined to protect her son and her family's past.

includedAssets.title: Never Judge A Lady By Her Lover
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep3 - Never Judge A Lady By Her Lover
includedAssets.synopsis: Gabrielle is reunited with an ex-lover, while Susan believes that Angie's son is responsible for her daughter's attacks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gabrielle is reunited with an ex-lover, while Susan believes that Angie's son is responsible for her daughter's attacks.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gabrielle is reunited with an ex-lover, while Susan believes that Angie's son is responsible for her daughter's attacks.

includedAssets.title: The God-Why-Don't-You-Love-Me-Blues
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep4 - The God-Why-Don't-You-Love-Me-Blues
includedAssets.synopsis: Losing Mike affects Katherine; Lynette asks her family to help out around the house; Susan learns Julie has been keeping secrets; Angie throws a party for Danny.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lynette asks her family to help out around the house; Susan learns Julie has been keeping secrets; Angie throws a party for Danny.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Losing Mike affects Katherine; Lynette asks her family to help out around the house; Susan learns Julie has been keeping secrets; Angie throws a party for Danny.

includedAssets.title: Everybody Ought To Have A Maid
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep5 - Everybody Ought To Have A Maid
includedAssets.synopsis: Gabrielle tries to prove that she is a responsible parent; Katherine and Susan come to blows; a new handyman offends Lynette; Danny's lapse in judgment leads to a terrible accident.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Gabrielle tries to prove that she is a responsible parent; Katherine and Susan come to blows; Danny's lapse in judgment leads to an accident.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Gabrielle tries to prove that she is a responsible parent; Katherine and Susan come to blows; a new handyman offends Lynette; Danny's lapse in judgment leads to a terrible accident.

includedAssets.title: Don't Walk On The Grass
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep6 - Don't Walk On The Grass
includedAssets.synopsis: Bree falls for Karl; Katherine attempts to seduce Mike, exacerbating her conflict with Susan; Gabrielle gets Juanita kicked out of school; Angie won't reveal the truth about her mother.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bree falls for Karl, Katherine attempts to seduce Mike and Gabrielle gets Juanita kicked out of school.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Bree falls for Karl; Katherine attempts to seduce Mike, exacerbating her conflict with Susan; Gabrielle gets Juanita kicked out of school; Angie won't reveal the truth about her mother.

includedAssets.title: Careful The Things You Say
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep7 - Careful The Things You Say
includedAssets.synopsis: Susan believes Katherine may be Julie's assailant; Angie invites Bree and Orson to dinner; Gabrielle struggles to home school Juanita; Lynette has suspicions about who attacked Julie.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Susan believes Katherine may be Julie's assailant, but Lynette has her own suspicions. Plus, Gabrielle struggles to home school Juanita.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Susan believes Katherine may be Julie's assailant; Angie invites Bree and Orson to dinner; Gabrielle struggles to home school Juanita; Lynette has suspicions about who attacked Julie.

includedAssets.title: The Coffee Cup
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep8 - The Coffee Cup
includedAssets.synopsis: Susan uncovers a connection between Katherine and Mike; Gabrielle tries to get Juanita into Catholic school; Lynette's pregnancy becomes hard to hide; Angie learns the truth about Bree.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Susan uncovers a connection between Katherine and Mike, Gabrielle tries to get Juanita into Catholic school and Angie learns the truth about Bree.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Susan uncovers a connection between Katherine and Mike; Gabrielle tries to get Juanita into Catholic school; Lynette's pregnancy becomes hard to hide; Angie learns the truth about Bree.

includedAssets.title: Would I Think Of Suicide?
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep9 - Would I Think Of Suicide?
includedAssets.synopsis: After another attack, Angie decides it is time to leave Wisteria Lane; Bree's affair with Karl becomes increasingly hard to hide; Lynette's pregnancy causes a rift with Gabrielle.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After another attack, Angie decides it is time to leave Wisteria Lane, while Lynette's pregnancy causes a rift with Gabrielle.

includedAssets.title: Boom Crunch
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep10 - Boom Crunch
includedAssets.synopsis: Susan comes up with a plan to help Katherine; Orson and Bree come to an agreement; a plane crashes on Wisteria Lane.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Susan comes up with a plan to help Katherine; Orson and Bree come to an agreement; a plane crashes on Wisteria Lane.

includedAssets.title: If...
includedAssets.synopsis: In the aftermath of the plane crash, the residents of Wisteria Lane think about what their lives might have been like had they made different choices.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the aftermath of the plane crash, the residents of Wisteria Lane think about what their lives might have been like had they made different choices.

includedAssets.title: You Gotta Get A Gimmick
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep12 - You Gotta Get A Gimmick
includedAssets.synopsis: Susan turns up the heat for Mike; Bree learns that it won't be easy to undo the hurt she has caused; Lynette discovers Tom's true intentions; Gabrielle examines feelings she has suppressed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bree learns that it won't be easy to make amends; Lynette discovers Tom's true intentions; Gabrielle examines feelings she has suppressed.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep13 - How About A Friendly Shrink?
includedAssets.synopsis: Lynette doesn't like the idea of seeing a couples' therapist; Katherine starts seeing a psychiatrist; Angie doesn't approve of Danny's new girlfriend.

includedAssets.title: The Glamorous Life
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep14 - The Glamorous Life
includedAssets.synopsis: Hostility grows between Angie and Gabrielle; Susan makes friends with a stripper; Tom and Lynette argue about their new therapist; Bree fears Orson might take his own life.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep15 - Lovely
includedAssets.synopsis: Susan causes a stir when she invites Robin into her home; Bree tries to entice Orson; Gabrielle looks for help with Ana.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep16 - The Chase
includedAssets.synopsis: Celia contracts chicken pox; Penny's birthday is forgotten; Bree hires a new employee; Katherine makes a discovery.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep17 - Chromolume No. 7

includedAssets.title: My Two Young Men
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep18 - My Two Young Men

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep19 - We All Deserve To Die
includedAssets.synopsis: Determined to derail Preston's marriage to Irina, Lynette discovers the truth about her future daughter-in-law; Gabrielle offers to help Bob and Lee without considering the consequences.

includedAssets.title: Epiphany
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep20 - Epiphany
includedAssets.synopsis: The Fairview strangler's past is revealed, including a time when Bree offered him a job, when Susan encouraged his interest in art and when Lynette showed him kindness and generosity.

includedAssets.title: A Little Night Music
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep21 - A Little Night Music

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep23 - I Guess This Is Goodbye

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: A new family with a dark past move to Wisteria Lane. Sixth season of the smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A new family move to Wisteria Lane. Teri Hatcher and Eva Longoria star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A new family with a dark past move to Wisteria Lane. Sixth season of the smash-hit drama series starring Teri Hatcher, Felicity Huffman, Marcia Cross and Eva Longoria.

includedIn.title: Desperate Housewives
includedIn.synopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Four housewives' lives are devastated when their friend commits suicide, but that's just the start of a string of shocking events on Wisteria Lane.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Four suburban housewives find their lives taking a shocking turn when their friend and neighbour unexpectedly commits suicide. But her tragic death turns out to be just the start of a string of shadowy and salacious goings-on on Wisteria Lane.
